bibl.title: New Light on a Dark Corner of the Hermopolite Nome.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Review article of: Ruey-Lin Chang, Un dossier fiscal hermopolitain d'époque romaine = Bibliothèque générale 46 (Le Caire, 2014). - Interpretation of 901 and 902. - Some Examples of Entries in 901 and 902. - Onomastic Data in the Texts. - Miscellaneous Comments.
bibl.seg: Peter van Minnen, New Light on a Dark Corner of the Hermopolite Nome.

Review article of: Ruey-Lin Chang, Un dossier fiscal hermopolitain d'époque romaine = Bibliothèque générale 46 (Le Caire, 2014). - Interpretation of 901 and 902. - Some Examples of Entries in 901 and 902. - Onomastic Data in the Texts. - Miscellaneous Comments.
